font-medium">Curated professional styles that guarantee your carousels look polished, not templated.</p></div></div><div class="border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm p-3 w-full rounded-3xl dark:border-neutral-800 dark:bg-neutral-900/40"><div class="flex flex-col gap-2"><div class="flex items-center gap-2"><div class="w-12 h-12 rounded-full bg-purple-100 flex items-center Editor</h2></div><p class="leading-relaxed text-neutral-500 dark:text-neutral-400 font-medium">Click-to-edit canvas with auto-fit text that prevents ugly overflows. No design skills needed.</p></div></div><div class="border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm p-3 w-full rounded-3xl dark:border-neutral-800 dark:bg-neutral-900/40"><div class="flex flex-col gap-2"><div class="flex items-center gap-2"><div class="w-12 h-12 rounded-full bg-purple-100 flex items-center justify-center"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 0 1-2-2v-4"></path><polyline points="7 10 12 15 17 10"></polyline><line x1="12" x2="12" y1="15" y2="3"></line></svg></div><h2 class="text-lg font-semibold">Export Ready</h2></div><p class="leading-relaxed text-neutral-500 dark:text-neutral-400 font-medium">Download as PDF or PNG, ready to post on LinkedIn with perfect formatting every time.</p></div></div></div></section><section href="https://opencollective.com/saasfly"><div class="flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 rounded-xl border-2 border-dashed border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700 hover:bg-accent
